# The `SCEVCastExpr` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This is the base class for unary cast operator classes. <a href="#details">More...</a>

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SCEVCastExpr</CodeBlock>
